name: math-invaders
description: A mobile-first web game combining Space Invaders with mental math

scripts.force-update: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=Date.now();let c=fs.readFileSync('public/sw.js','utf8');c=c.replace(/const CACHE_VERSION = '[^']+'/,'const CACHE_VERSION = \''+v+'\'');fs.writeFileSync('public/sw.js',c);console.log('Cache version updated to:',v);"
